authors: Bianca La Cioppa For Daily Mail Australia
description: Shannan Ponton spent some quality time with his wife Kyle and two children on Wednesday as they arrived in Bali for a family getaway.
title: The Biggest Loser Australia's Shannan arrives in Bali with wife Kylie and their kids
title_page: The Biggest Loser Australia's Shannan arrives in Bali with wife Kylie and their kids | Daily Mail Online
text:
He is due to return to the cameras in the coming weeks to commence filming The Biggest Loser Australia.
But on Wednesday trainer Shannan Ponton spent some quality time with his wife Kyle and two children - Milla, one, and Maximus, three - as they arrived in Bali for a family getaway.
While walking through Ngurah Rai international airport the 42-year-old showed off his muscular figure as he dressed in a tight-fitting T-shirt.
Going on a trip: Shannan Ponton spent some quality time with his wife Kyle and two children on Wednesday as they arrived in Bali for a family getaway
He matched his plain choice of clothing with a pair of black ripped denim shorts, which gave onlookers view of his never-ending leg tattoos.
Shannan displayed a large smile as he covered his eyes with a pair of sunglasses.
The reality TV star put his superb fitness to good use as he pushed the family's luggage in front of him while Maximus comfortably sat on the handle bar.
Ready to relax: The 42-year-old showed off his muscular figure as he dressed in a tight-fitting T-shirt and black denim shorts
Superstar style: He hid his eyes beneath a pair of sunglasses as he made his way through the airport
Put to work: The reality TV star was seen putting his superb fitness to good use as he pushed the family's luggage in front of him while Maximus comfortably sat on the handle bar
His wife Kylie stunned as she also opted for a black and white outfit for the getaway.
The mother-of-two showed off her already sun-kissed skin as she slipped into a baggy black tank top and white knee-length shorts.
While pushing her daughter's pram, the tied her blonde hair back into a messy ponytail, showing off her minimal make-up look.
Friendly: They were then pictured chatting to local staff members
Matching: Kylie mimicked her husbands look and also opted for a black and white outfit for their holiday
Casual: She showed off her minimal make-up look as she tied her blonde hair back into a messy ponytail
The family-of-four were later pictured entering an awaiting vehicle as they made their way to their awaiting destination.
Last year Kylie spoke to the Daily Telegraph about the possibility of expanding her family stating she would 'love a third child' within the next five years.
The beauty tied the knot with Shannan in 2010 in a private Sydney ceremony.
On the move: The family-of-four were later pictured entering an awaiting vehicle as they made their way to their awaiting destination
